name: LayerZZZ
description:
The WebGL is an old build, uploaded before itch.io crash, and we don’t understand why, we changed it before submissions. The sound is trash and there are assets missing, so it’s better to download the MacOS or Windows build.

LayerZZZ is a submission to the 2019 GMTKJam. For the theme « Only one », we decided to make a game in which you only see one information at a time. 

Shoot your way through this procedurally generated level to find the switch who opens the boss room. 

Controls : 

-  ZQSD/WASD to move
- Press TAB to switch between layers (enemies, environment , health, ammunition, pause)
- Left click to shoot when on enemies and environment layers / heal on health layer / reload on ammunition layer / pause and unpause on pause layer

This game was made by : 

Itchig0 - game design, level design, programming
Mathilde Miossec - art direction, 3D art (https://twitter.com/mmvthilde
Romain Dannin - game design, level design, programming  (https://twitter.com/DnnnRomain)

All sounds were downloaded on freesound.org, I forgot to credit the creators I'll make sure to do it soon.
